title: Predicting the spatio-temporal distribution of the invasive alien ...
summary: This blog post focuses on predicting the spatio-temporal distribution of an invasive alien species by comparing modeling results with field survey data. It details the methodology for conducting field surveys and using the data to validate dispersal models.
usefulness_reason: Score 65 assigned because the post directly addresses "spatio-temporal distribution" and explicitly uses "field survey data" for model validation. This aligns well with the 'Spatio Temporal' and 'Survey data' aspects of the query.
